title: Check Claim Status
description: A biller wants to check the status of a high-dollar claim that was submitted two weeks ago.

tasks.description: Identify the claim in the billing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller locates the specific claim they want to check.

tasks.description: Submit an electronic claim status request (276 query) to the payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller sends an electronic inquiry to the insurance company.

tasks.description: Review the claim status response (277), which indicates the claim has been 'pended' for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller receives an update on the claim's status and knows that no further action is needed at this time.
